column4: Hi guys, wondering if you can help me out with a ubuntu install. I've tried multiple times using the two most recent versions, and every time I boot up the live cd on my laptop, it freezes and I can't get anything on the desktop to load. The cd's work just fine on any other computer though so I know thats not a problem. I've gotten another version of linux installed on my latop (through a network install) But it gives me difficulti
Is there a network install for ubuntu, or any other option I can use?
I'd recommend giving the !alternate CD a shot
You could do that too, see !install for a link about that
